members.signatureBeforeChange: LRESULT wmXButtonUp (int hwnd, int wParam, int lParam)
members.signatureAfterChange: LRESULT wmXButtonUp (int hwnd, int wParam, int lParam)
diff: -	int mask = OS.MK_LBUTTON | OS.MK_MBUTTON | OS.MK_RBUTTON | OS.MK_XBUTTON1 | OS.MK_XBUTTON2;
+	* Bug in Windows.  On some machines that do not have XBUTTONs,
+	* the MK_XBUTTON1 and OS.MK_XBUTTON2 bits are sometimes set,
+	* causing mouse capture to become stuck.  The fix is to test
+	* for the extra buttons only when they exist.
